workloads.load-manager: Path to a pickled and loaded LoadManager instance to build jobs from
workloads.heatmap: Using a user specified heatmap (csv format) to overload the heatmap produce by a `load-manager` or `db` instances

generator.type: Type of generator (or a path to a python file?)
generator.arg: Argument (for Random the number of jobs, for Dict the name and frequency of loads and for List the path to the file containing the list)

distribution.type: Type of the distribution or path to .py file

schedulers.default: Sets the default scheduler from name or path to a .py file
others: names or paths to other scheduling algorithms
